meanings.definition: To subject to the action of sound waves.
meanings.sent1: The scientist sonicated the liquid to mix it thoroughly.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician sonicated the sample to break down the particles.
meanings.sent3: The blender sonicated the ingredients into a smooth paste.
meanings.sent4: The music speaker sonicated the room with its booming bass.
meanings.sent5: The ultrasound machine sonicated the tissue to visualize it better.

meanings.definition: To disperse or separate by ultrasonic vibrations.
